name: Lost at Sea (Ramil Hinshaw, Adam Armijo)
name_original: Lost at Sea (Ramil Hinshaw, Adam Armijo)
description:
Made for the ICT Winter 2021 Gamejam

Theme: Lost and Found

Lost At Sea is a game very similar to the game battleship except with the use of playing cards.

You don't need to fire at each segment of the ship but instead must fire at it multiple times to decrease the health.
